author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 15-year-old boy is feared to have drowned while swimming in the sea at the Marina Beach on Monday.

The boy, identified as Ajith, had come to the beach along with his friends. They went to the sea to take a dip, but after some time his friends realised that Ajith was missing. They kept looking for him, but in vain. A complaint has been lodged in the Anna Square police station. Officials suspect that the waves might have pulled him in.
title: Boy feared drowned off Marina beach
